data.title: All Nominees For 2024 Emmys
data.meta_description: Here is a complete list of the nominees for the 76th Emmy Awards, featuring “The Bear,” “Shōgun” and all of your favorites.
data.text:
If you click on a link and make a purchase we may receive a small commission. Read our editorial policy.

Here Is The Complete List of Nominees For the 76th Emmy Awards

Slake your curiosity regarding who was nominated for an Emmy this year now.

Guides by Avery Kaplan, Contributing writer

Published on Fri Aug 02 2024

Television’s most glamorous night is just around the corner. On September 15, 2024, the 76th Emmy Awards will take place at 8:00 PM Eastern 5:00 PM Pacific on ABC, streaming the next day on Hulu. Meanwhile, the 76th Creative Arts Emmy Awards will take place over the course of two consecutive nights: Saturday, September 7, 2024 and Sunday, September 8, 2024. An edited presentation of the Creative Arts Emmy Awards will be broadcast on Saturday, September 14, 2024 at 8:00 PM Eastern and Pacific on FXX.

But with 123 categories across two Emmy Awards ceremonies, it can be difficult to keep track of all the quality programming that was nominated. Never fear, because Popverse has all of the nominees for you right here.

Here are the nominees for the 76th Emmy Awards and 76th Creative Arts Emmy Awards:

Avery Kaplan: Avery lives and writes in Southern California. She is the co-author of Double Challenge: Being LGBTQ and a Minority with her spouse, Rebecca Oliver Kaplan. Avery is Features Editor at Comics Beat, and you can also find her writing on StarTrek.com, The Gutter Review, Geek Girl Authority, and in the margins of the books in her personal library.
